definition: to knock/to grasp sth in the hand and beat it/to toughen oneself up
to throw down/to fall/to drop and break
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: They beat it out with flails, he and the woman together.
sentences.chinese: 他和她用连枷摔打水稻脱粒，摔打完后再扬场。

sentences.english: They beat it out with flails, he and the woman together.
sentences.chinese: 他和她用连枷摔打水稻脱粒，摔打完后再扬场。

sentences.english: Alloy steel body, higher stability, let the beat is not easy to damage.
sentences.chinese: 合金钢车身，稳定性更高，任凭摔打不易损坏。

sentences.english: It also works as insulation and cushions us from knocks and falls.
sentences.chinese: 这一层也可以作为我们摔打时的隔离层或缓冲垫。

definition: to throw down/to fall/to drop and break
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
to pat/to slap/(of a bird) to flap (one's wings)
to knock against/to bump into/to have a disagreement/to clash
(of waves, rain etc) to dash against/to batter
